mapper.sql: Id, request_num, project_id, purchase_dept, applicant,applicant_id, method, agency, apply_date, amount, content, status, creater,creater_id, create_time, update_time, delete_time
mapper.select:
select * from purchase_request pr left join project p on pr.project_id = p.id where pr.delete_time is null
and pr.project_id like concat('%',#{projectId},'%')
and pr.applicant like concat('%',#{applicant},'%')
and pr.method like concat('%',#{method},'%')
and pr.apply_date like concat('%',#{applyDate},'%')
and pr.status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
order by pr.create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from purchase_request where delete_time is null
and project_id like concat('%',#{projectId},'%')
and applicant like concat('%',#{applicant},'%')
and method like concat('%',#{method},'%')
and apply_date like concat('%',#{applyDate},'%')
and status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
